title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content (HTML text within <html>...</html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags), the content type does not have any effect.
EB:
The expected behavior is as follows:

- For the Plain Content Type, the literal content should be displayed, including any tags.

- For the Auto Content Type, the content should be displayed without any HTML or RTF tags.

- For the HTML Content Type, the content should be displayed without HTML tags except for content 3, which should be displayed with RTF tags.

Please refer to the attached report for more details.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a database field with the mentioned content types.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
